name: 2025 4th International Conference on Materials Engineering and Functional Materials
content: Submissions will be peer reviewed by conference program committees and international reviewers, accepted and presented papers of ICMFM 2025 will be published into Springer Proceedings in Materials, which will be submitted to EI Compendex, SCOPUS and SCImago databases for abstracting and indexing.
